title: Service disruption between Joo Koon and Boon Lay due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 因轨道故障导致裕廊湖站至文礼站服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan antara Joo Koon dan Boon Lay disebabkan oleh kerosakan trek
title_translations.ta: தடப் பிழை காரணமாக ஜூ கூன் மற்றும் பூன் லே இடையே சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [EWL] UPDATE: Due to an earlier track fault, pls add 10mins travel time between #BoonLay & #JooKoon.
[EWL] CLEARED: Free regular bus & free bridging bus services have ceased.
[EWL] UPDATE: [EWL]: Due to an earlier track fault, pls add 10mins travel time between #BoonLay & #JooKoon.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train service resumed. Free regular bus & free bridging bus services are still available between #JooKoon & #BoonLay.
[EWL] UPDATE: No train service between #JooKoon & #BoonLay. Check our bus guides at https://t.co/skznEuBuRM
[EWL]No train service between #JooKoon &#BoonLay due to a track fault at #JooKoon. Free bridging bus is available between #JooKoon &#BoonLay
